settings.heading: Whole Body Health, Pure Colostrum
settings.description:
Redeem Your Health and Run Your Race with Favor— Nature's First Superfood.

Boost your gut health, strengthen your immune system, recover faster, and improve overall wellness with Favor’s Full-Fat Spectrum Colostrum.

settings.heading: What holds you                        back from Thriving?

settings.description:
The Modern Western Diet Isn’t Enough

On average, Americans consume 57% of their calories from ultra-processed foods.

Low energy, digestive issues, and weak immunity are all symptoms of the low-nutrition and ultra-processed Western diet.

Favor Colostrum rebuilds your immune barriers—the foundation of robust health—empowering you to live vibrantly and keep your family thriving. Packed with vital nutrients and immunoglobulins our First Milking Full-Fat Spectrum Colostrum is scientifically proven to boost gut and immune health.

settings.text:
Favor is the only brand with 100% Transparent Sourcing, meaning we have been to the farms where our Colostrum comes from, have partnered with the drying plant to ensure the lowest possible heat is used when converting to a powder, and verified that we are only using Colostrum from the First Milking. And because we own our own manufacturing facilities, we are able to uphold quality, value, and transparency through the entire process.

Every batch is third party tested for the crucial bioactives and is tested through every step of the process to ensure you only receive the best quality Colostrum on the Market.

  • 60-day money back guarantee
  • Third party tested
  • Produced in GMP facility
  • 1st Milking Colostrum
  • 100% Transparent Supply Chain
  • Gluten-Free
  • Antibiotic-free
  • Hormone-Free
  • RBST (RBGH) free

settings.heading: Simple, Potent, Proven
settings.description:
Easily incorporate into your daily habits.

Great in smoothies, coffee, protein shakes, dry scoop or on yogurt or cereal.

Highly concentrated colostrum powder sourced from the first milking of  cows from American family dairy farms, our colostrum is a powerhouse of natural immunity boosters, digestive enzymes, and energy enhancers. It's designed to fortify your body's natural defenses, from the foundational  barrier to the critical gut linings.

The Original Superfood

Millions have experienced the transformative benefits of Bovine Colostrum, the original superfood essential for thriving health. Used for over a century, Bovine Colostrum supports comprehensive wellness restoration.

Backed by over 5,000 clinical studies, it delivers unmatched immune support, enhanced digestion, quicker recovery, and boosted energy. Endorsed by medical professionals, Bovine Colostrum is a trusted choice for those seeking effective natural health solutions. Discover more from doctors here: See link here.
More than your average colostrum supplement, Favor Colostrum sets a new standard.

settings.heading: Lean Health For You & Your Family

settings.description:
Colostrum is the first breastmilk that mammals consume.

Favor Colostrum is sourced within 6 hours post-birth, capturing the highest potency and concentration of nutrients possible 

Favor Colostrum is gently dehydrated using low heat to maintain the bioavailability of over 400 nutrients, making it the most complete in the market.

Favor’s First Milking, Full-Fat Spectrum Colostrum provides complete support for your gut barrier, immune health, hair and skin complexion.

At Favor our Mission is - To Glorify God by creating Lean Healthy Products that empower families to live and lead faithfully.

That’s why we chose Colostrum as our core ingredient as it’s a superfood that can be used to restore your entire Family’s health.

With one glass of your favorite beverage
Shake or stir until it dissolves

settings.title: Awesome product!
